explanation.rules:
The Mansi numerals are formed as follows:
* 5 — at
* 6 — xōt
* 8 — ńollow
* 9 — ontъlow
* 50 — atlow
* 60 — xōtlow
* 80 — ńolsāt
* 90 — ontъlsāt
* 10 + α — α-xujplow
* 100α — α-sāt
* 10(β−1) + α — (10β) nopъlα
* 100(β−1) + α — (100β)-n α
* 90 + α — 90 α
* 900 + α — 900 α

*Note:* Both nopъl and the ending -n mean “towards”; for example, 49 atlow nopъl ontъllow literally means “nine (on the way) towards fifty.”
